flounder.textures

Class TextureBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.textures.TextureBuilder

  • public class TextureBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A class capable of setting up a Texture.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected TextureBuilder(MyFile textureFile)
      Creates a class to setup a Texture.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextureBuilder clampEdges()
      Clamps the texture to the edges.
      TextureBuilder clampToBorder(Colour colour)
      Clamps the texture to a coloured border.
      Texture create()
      Creates a new texture, carries out the CPU loading, and loads to OpenGL.
      Texture createInBackground()
      Creates a new texture and sends it to be loadedTextures by the loader thread.
      Texture createInSecondThread()
      Creates a new texture, carries out the CPU loading, and sends to the main thread for GL loading.
      Colour getBorderColour()
      Gets the border colour.
      MyFile getFile()
      Gets the source file.
      boolean isAnisotropic()
      Gets if anisotropic.
      boolean isClampEdges()
      Gets if clamping to edges.
      boolean isClampToBorder()
      Gets if clamping to border.
      boolean isMipmap()
      Gets if mipmapping.
      boolean isNearest()
      Gets if nearest filtering.
      TextureBuilder nearestFiltering()
      Selects nearest filtering.
      TextureBuilder noFiltering()
      Disables anisotropic filtering.
      TextureBuilder noMipmap()
      Disables mipmapping.
